Package cetus.analysis

Class IPPointsToAnalysis.AbstractLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.hir.PseudoSymbol
      • cetus.analysis.IPPointsToAnalysis.AbstractLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Symbol
    Enclosing class:
    IPPointsToAnalysis
    public static class IPPointsToAnalysis.AbstractLocation
extends PseudoSymbol
implements Symbol
    AbstractLocation represents a abstract location that is not referenced to in terms of a program variable.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public static IPPointsToAnalysis.AbstractLocation getLocation​(Expression e)
        Returns an abstract locations represented by the given expression e. It constructs a new one if there is no predefined location associated with the given program structure e.
        Parameters:
        e - the expression that is used to create a unique tag for the abstract location to be returned.
        Returns:
        the abstract location associated with the given expression.

      • getLocation

        public static IPPointsToAnalysis.AbstractLocation getLocation​(Expression e,
                                                              Statement s)
        Returns an abstract locations represented by the given expression e and the statement s. It performs the same operations as getLocation(Expression) does but use s as a tag for the location to be returned.
        Parameters:
        e - the expression from which the abstract location is created.
        s - the statement to be used as a tag for the location.
        Returns:
        the abstract location associated with the given input.

      • getIRSymbol

        public Symbol getIRSymbol()
        Returns the representative symbol for the abstract location. The procedure object that contains the relevant site will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getIRSymbol in class PseudoSymbol
